alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 12:41AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lauderdale, Colbert and north central Lawrence Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1240 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lexington to near Sheffield to 7 miles southwest of Cherokee. Movement was to the southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Rogersville, Killen, Cherokee, Lexington, Leighton and St. Florian. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
